A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This film isn't perfect - parts were slow\, there are plot holes\, questions that are not answered\, some rough acting\, and some less than compelling characters. BUT it's still a good movie! Star Wars\, as a series\, is riddled with these exact problems. This movie feels more like the original trilogy than any of the prequels. Go with an open mind and you'll enjoy it!
